name: RealityHomeForChinese
0:
”Alexa, turn on my switch 1”
”Alexa, turn off my switch 1”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Easy wire-free installation over your existing light switches, either toggle or rocker style
Voice commands: turn lights on/off using your voice, with either Echo Plus or Wink Zigbee Hub. 
Can also be operated without voice or wireless connection, using the manual button
Control your lights from anywhere using the Echo Plus or Wink Mobile app

Using ThirdReaity with Alexa is a easy way to control your RealitySwitch or other smart products. Here are some examples to get started:

“Alexa, lock the front door.”
“Alexa, turn on the downstairs switch.”

Visit http://www.3reality.com for a full list of ThirdReality compatible products that works with Alexa.
